title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\UpdateProductRequest
name: UpdateProductRequest
description:
Request message for [UpdateProduct][] method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.UpdateProductRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.product
params.description: Required. The product to update/create. If the caller does not have permission to update the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product], regardless of whether or not it exists, a PERMISSION_DENIED error is returned. If the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] to update does not exist, a NOT_FOUND error is returned.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Indicates which fields in the provided [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] to update. The immutable and output only fields are NOT supported. If not set, all supported fields (the fields that are neither immutable nor output only) are updated. If an unsupported or unknown field is provided, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned.
